thread.title: Suki Waterhouse Debuts Platinum Hair and Dark Roots at Milan Fashion Week - Vogue
thread.title_full: Suki Waterhouse Debuts Platinum Hair and Dark Roots at Milan Fashion Week - Vogue

title: Suki Waterhouse Debuts Platinum Hair and Dark Roots at Milan Fashion Week - Vogue
text: Suki Waterhouse Goes Platinum! Why Glam-Grunge Hair Color Is Back February 23, 2017 8:53 PM by Sophie Schulte-Hillen Photo: Getty Images Aside from that single blink-and-you’ll-miss-it brunette moment a couple of years ago, Suki Waterhouse has generally stayed in her It-Brit lane with thick sunny highlights—until now. The London-based front row favorite delivered a fresh surprise with a punkish solid dye job at Milan Fashion Week today. Waterhouse, who has confessed to souping up her street–to–red carpet mane with a Coca Cola rinse on occasion to avoid setting foot inside a salon, couldn’t resist a double dose of bleach for the shows—stealing the spotlight with platinum hair and a game-changing inch of dark roots. Blame it on Kurt Cobain , who would have turned 50 this week, or perhaps sheer late-winter hair ennui. The former is certainly more likely, considering her grungy swipe of red lipstick paired with a plaid dress. Arbiters of downtown chic, like model Soo Joo Park and pop goddess Katy Perry , have already fired up the trend earlier this month during the New York shows, but with fashion’s resident bedhead expert offering a ringing European endorsement, it’s clear: Platinum hair is hitting its cool-girl stride. In This Story: Suki Waterhouse Recommended For You
